title: greentech2
author: greentech2
content: I see that PancakeSwap wants me to migrate to V3. I go to PancakeSwap website to Earn - Farms then select Staked only but I don't see any my CAKE-BND LP. PancakeSwap doesn't have any email for support. Does anyone have the same problem? Thanks.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: greentech2 on April 07, 2023, 12:47:06 AMI see that PancakeSwap wants me to migrate to V3. I go to PancakeSwap website to Earn - Farms then select Staked only but I don't see any my CAKE-BND LP. PancakeSwap doesn't have any email for support. Does anyone have the same problem? Thanks.They have no customer support, as they say on this page. But you can question your problem on their social media. I think you will not only get answers from their side, but from other fellow users as well. Here is a list of their social media (global):Discord | TelegramThat's all I can help you with, mate. I hope your problem can be solved ASAP.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: greentech2 on April 07, 2023, 12:47:06 AMI see that PancakeSwap wants me to migrate to V3. I go to PancakeSwap website to Earn - Farms then select Staked only but I don't see any my CAKE-BND LP. PancakeSwap doesn't have any email for support. Does anyone have the same problem? Thanks.Had same issue when pancake was migrating from V1 to V2. I don't remember exactly what I did, but it didn't need support. I think you should be able to switch back to v2, because, most likely, you are looking for your v2 pool in a place where there are only v3 pools. Thats why its not listed. I'm pretty sure I found my LP tokens using nothing but the pancakeswap app. If anything, I recommend looking for an admin on Telegram and ask him. Just watch out for scammers. Never give your private key to anyone.

comments.author: rokok lokal
comments.body: If you're having trouble finding your CAKE-BNB LP tokens on PancakeSwap V3, it could be because they are staked somewhere else. Check your other wallets or platforms to see if your tokens are there. If you still can't find them, you can reach out to the PancakeSwap team on social media or community forums for help.

comments.author: greentech2
comments.body: I think I am in PancakeSwap V2.  I click in Pools and I still see my 111.85280 CAKE Locked until Aug 12, 2023.I try to ask in Telegram but no answer.

comments.author: greentech2
comments.created_time: April 09, 2023, 04:16:03 PMLast edit: April 10, 2023, 02:10:41 AM by greentech2
comments.body: There is a Telegram PanCakeSwap supporter who contacts me.  Acctually he is a scam giving me a website that asks me to provide the 12 secret words of my MetaMask wallet.  A person in Pancakeswap in Reddit contacts me by direct message is a scam too.

comments.author: greentech2
comments.body: I found the guide in PancakeSwap website.  I don't see my CAKE-BND LP token in V2.  I need to follow the PancakeSwap v3 Migration(Migrate to continue farming CAKE rewards and earning trading fees).  I click Remove V2 Liquidity and see my 7.82 CAKE-BND V2 LP.  I am sucessfull to stake CAKE-WBNB LP in PancakeSwap V3 Farming.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: I didn't have the same problem with PancakeSwap when I migrated to V3, but there were other problems, it seems that the version is not fully developed yet and needs some time to fully migrate.So for now you can continue working on V2 until the V3 upgrade is finalized.

comments.author: merekamo
comments.body: Why migrate from PancakeSwap V2 to V3? As long as there is no problem with the V2, just use the V2 first. Before deciding to migrate from PancakeSwap V2 to V3, it's important to understand the potential benefits of upgrading. Every migration or upgrade carries a certain level of risk. While PancakeSwap may encourage users to migrate to V3, that doesn't mean it's the right choice for everyone right now. But, if it's an emergency you have to use V3, definitely join the Telegram group, scroll down and you can find Telegram there.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: all I know is that migration from the contract won't remove your token from the chain. it should be there unless you move it since everything on the smart contract need your approval or your wallet got hacked, you approve some suspicious contract that have ability to move the token.try contact the admin on telegram group but careful with scammer because there is dozen out there you will be DM by some of them. and your LP should be there if you farming it there is possible in tab farm history here https://pancakeswap.finance/farms/historyand liquidity should be here https://pancakeswap.finance/liquidity and try looking on bscscan if there is token with LP on it that is your token
